font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 淫窥狂： one obtaining sexual gratification from observing unsuspecting individuals who are partly undressed, naked, or engaged in sexual acts
【例】 They accidentally found out that their ostensibly benign neighbor is actually a voyeur. 他们偶然间发现那个表面和善的邻居居然是一个偷窥狂。
【近】 peeper
【派】 voyeurism n. 偷窥癖

【记】 音：望淫→窥淫；voyage 客轮航海过程中有窥淫狂，游轮上常有色情狂
